articles.title: Gareth Southgate dealt another World Cup injury blow as England plans unravel - The Mirror
articles.description: Gareth Southgate will name his 26-man England squad for the World Cup on Thursday, but he has been forced to change his plans yet again after another injury blow
articles.content:
England boss Gareth Southgate has been dealt yet another injury blow after Ben Chilwell was ruled out of the World Cup.
